name: ScienceQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open science quiz”
”Alexa, start science quiz”
”Alexa, launch science quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: science quiz
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Science Quiz" is an Alexa skill designed to test your general knowledge about the world of science of chemistry and biology. Users are asked general questions and must answer with a "yes" or "no." Each time the user guesses the answer, they earn one point. Every ten questions the user's point will be announced.
The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.
In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.
